mission.posting: A church called the Eastboro Durtist Church has made headlines recently because of their bold statements and outlandish claims. We want you to mess with their website.

email.subject: Dickish Religion
email.body:
This is frankly one of the most ridiculous missions ever. There's this church called the Eastboro Durtist Church. It's infamous for making very... interesting statements. I'll let you see them for yourself. We want you to mess with their site just a bit. Replace every zero that appears in their x-server.sys file with "DICKS" exactly as it appears.
Have fun, -Z3r0

attachments.note: Use the command replace to replace strings. Usage: replace "ORIGINAL TEXT" "REPLACEMENT TEXT"
